title: Bye, T-SQL! In-database Analytics with R in SQL Server 2016
description: Microsoft SQL Server 2016 now provides the ability to use R for data analytics and data science applications where T-SQL was once the only option. This session will explore provisioning your SQL Server for R Services and walk through a real world example of performing analysis of your data right at the source. We'll discuss the architecture of R Services in SQL Server and hidden benefits of executing R scripts on SQL Server.
